snippet: Elijah Daniel, a defensive end, and two other men were charged with theft and burglary after an investigation into items missing from dormitory rooms.
abstract: Auburn defensive end Elijah Daniel, who was arrested in connection with dorm room burglary, is dismissed from team.
lead_paragraph: Elijah Daniel, a defensive end, and two other men were charged with theft and burglary after an investigation into items missing from dormitory rooms.

headline.main: Auburn Player Accused of Theft Is Dismissed
headline.print_headline: Player Accused of Theft Is Dismissed
